m_szDocSumamry: System and method for starting fuel cell vehicle in emergency US 8676416 B2 Abstract The present invention provides a system and method for starting a fuel cell vehicle in an emergency, which can start the fuel cell by supplying necessary air to the fuel cell even in the event of a failure or malfunction of a high voltage system, the high voltage system including a high voltage DC-DC converter and a high voltage battery which are generally used as a power source of an air blower during start-up of the fuel cell.
